statart 0.1.1
  • Reference

Function reference

Stata-like Functions

Functions providing Stata-inspired functionality.

codebook()
View the codebook of a dataset or selected variables.
ds()
List column names by tidyselect
summ()
Summarise columns
tab() tab1() tab2() fre() fre1() fre2()
Tabulate columns

S-Tools

Small tools to improve efficiency.

s_match()
Tidyselect columns in stata style
s_print()
Print a long tibble with its first and last rows
s_select()
Enhanced select() with data-masking
s_time()
Time spent on a function
s_try()
Try a function and return a logical
s_type() s_unit()
The clean type of an object.

Type Conversion

Type conversion accommondate haven-labelled vectors.

as_character() as_numeric()
Better type conversion
skew() kurtosis()
Skewness and kurtosis

Sample Data

lifeexp
Life expectancy data in 1998
starwars
Starwars characters
